data.name: MY Neko Waifu!
data.detailed_description:
Beach, sun, sea, nice cat girls!


Only you are missing!



Come, don't be so, they themselves want to get to know you and have a good time sorting out interesting puzzles;)

Have a nice time and relax will help you:


  • 10 beautiful neko girls on the beach
  • lots of interesting levels
  • high-quality gallery
  • nice music and effects
  • 100 achievements
data.about_the_game:
Beach, sun, sea, nice cat girls!


Only you are missing!



Come, don't be so, they themselves want to get to know you and have a good time sorting out interesting puzzles;)

Have a nice time and relax will help you:


  • 10 beautiful neko girls on the beach
  • lots of interesting levels
  • high-quality gallery
  • nice music and effects
  • 100 achievements
data.short_description: A puzzle with anime girls on the beach. You can get to know each kitty better by passing exciting levels.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: ntel® Core™ i3 Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Serise or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
